original_text: And she fastened it with the pin, and said unto him, The Philistines be upon thee, Samson. And he awaked out of his sleep, and went away with the pin of the beam, and with the web.
korean_text: 들릴라가 바디로 그 머리털을 단단히 짜고 그에게 이르되 삼손이여 블레셋 사람들이 당신에게 들이닥쳤느니라 하니 삼손이 잠을 깨어 베틀의 바디와 날실을 다 빼내니라

sentences.original_text: And she fastened it with the pin
The Philistines be upon thee, Samson
sentences.korean_translation: 블레셋 사람들이 너를 잡으러 왔느니라, 삼손아

sentences.original_text: And he awaked out of his sleep
and went away with the pin of the beam
